t_shirt_example.name: Premium Cotton T-Shirt
t_shirt_example.description: High-quality 100% organic cotton t-shirt with modern fit. Perfect for casual wear and layering. Machine washable and pre-shrunk for lasting comfort.
t_shirt_example.short_description: Premium organic cotton t-shirt with modern fit

jeans_example.name: Classic Straight Leg Jeans
jeans_example.description: Timeless straight leg jeans made from premium denim with stretch for comfort. Features classic 5-pocket design and traditional styling that never goes out of fashion.
jeans_example.short_description: Classic straight leg jeans with stretch comfort

dress_example.name: Elegant Summer Dress
dress_example.description: Beautiful flowing summer dress perfect for any occasion. Made from lightweight breathable fabric with a flattering A-line silhouette. Features adjustable straps and side pockets.
dress_example.short_description: Elegant flowing summer dress with adjustable straps

sneakers_example.name: Urban Runner Sneakers
sneakers_example.description: Modern athletic sneakers designed for both performance and style. Features breathable mesh upper, cushioned sole, and durable rubber outsole. Perfect for running, gym, or casual wear.
sneakers_example.short_description: Modern athletic sneakers for performance and style

jacket_example.name: Winter Puffer Jacket
jacket_example.description: Warm and stylish puffer jacket perfect for cold weather. Features water-resistant outer shell, down insulation, and multiple pockets. Hood is detachable for versatile styling.
jacket_example.short_description: Warm puffer jacket with detachable hood

simple_accessory_example.name: Leather Belt
simple_accessory_example.description: Classic genuine leather belt with metal buckle. Versatile design works with both casual and formal outfits. Available in multiple colors and sizes.
simple_accessory_example.short_description: Classic genuine leather belt with metal buckle
